name: TRAPPIST (itch)
description:
A Ludum Dare 42 Entry 

Theme: "Running out of space".

In the year 2025 The Chinese Army started cloning supersoldiers in order to create a help them create military state.
By the year 2054 the mass cloning has caused a world-spread overpopulation, forcing the US government to escape earth and settle in the military base on TRAPPIST-1d. 

Today is the day we return! 

Go on a mission to destroy the Central Shanghai Sperm Bank and reclaim our planet.

CONTROLS:

ARROWS - movement

Z - deploy bomb / skip dialogue 

X - shoot

C - detonate bomb

TIP: You can control the bomb once it's deployed.
